"Write your goals on a piece of paper with a pencil and keep it in a visible place to remind yourself of your commitment."
"Use a pencil to draw a picture of yourself achieving your goals and place it in a prominent location to stay motivated."
"Write down your progress towards your goals with a pencil and celebrate each milestone with a small reward."
"Use a pencil to create a vision board of your ideal future and hang it in a place where you can see it every day."
"Draw a pencil with a sharpened point and use it as a reminder to stay focused and dedicated to your goals."
